ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Bard stuff
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yes, that s what I used to do to test if the lament was still on - /con everything I d lamented.  I thought they d fixed this so it didn t work anymore.  I
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 2 Mar 2000, Sylly Songsynger wrote:
>
> Anyone care to comment on my observation that Lament song will change the
> faction con? E.g.: I lament a Spectre and it goes from blue scowling to
> blue indifferent. I have done this several times. Not being a true tester,

Yes, that's what I used to do to test if the lament was still
on - /con everything I'd lamented. I thought they'd fixed
this so it didn't work anymore. I haven't done it in about 8
months.

> Yes, we took a little jaunt to the Plane of Hate. Not too long into the
> expedition we dropped a scorn banshee and all of a sudden peeps were saying:
> "Gratz Sylly!" "Woo hoo Sylly!" And I am like "uhh what?" So they tell me
> to loot it and WOW!!!
>
> Imbrued Platemail Greaves: AC 16, +5 str, +9 sta, +9 agil, +10 magic. Wt.
> 5.6. Bard only. magic no drop

Congratulations. I got my boots last night. Makes me look
like I'm wearing Golden Efreeti Boots. :)

Imbrued Platemail Boots: AC 16, +5 str, +9 sta, +10 magic

> Fun place when the pull goes right. When it dont: train, res; train, res;
> train, res. You have lost a Level!
>
> Sylly SongSynger
> Bardette of 48 songs (I was 48 for almost a whole day and I'll be 48 again
> so for now I am 48 -.05 bub no biggie ;p)

Heh. I died 4 times (including my second death to Innoruk in
straight melee - the bastard still refuses to Death Touch me),
lost level 48 4 times, got it back 3 times with the res, and
got the last one back with exp I made while on Hate. So I am
at 48 + .01. :)

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
